price: 67. (Al Jidr) le contestó: “No serás paciente conmigo.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International

meta.transliteration: qāla innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
